name: DomiCard_VR
description:
• This game is built with unity3D, should be able to play at 
    • Windows (WELL TESTED), 
    • Mac, 
    • and Linux platforms. 
  • Supported VR platforms:
    • SteamVR (WELL TESTED),
    • Daydream,
    • OculusVR,
    • XimmerseVR (Oculus).
  • Have a look at the "Introduction" in the start scene, there will be a short introduction in word (left side) and a short video (right side).
  • There are two example folders under the application's datapath (/DomiCard_VR 1.0_Data/GameExamples/). Players can load these two example in game  and have a play with them. (Note: Example01 contains more than 2,000 cards, which may resulte in a low in-game fps.)
  • Please leave comments of email  (domicardvideogame@gmail.com) me if you find any bugs or you have any suggestions. Also, donation is wellcome if you enjoy this game.
DomiCard (non-VR) is coming on Steam!
